title: IoT-based educational system innovation and systems thinking analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy, educational systems, and fundamental understanding of IoT technology
context.additional_context: In smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, analyze the impact of IoT on educational systems through project-based assessments using systems thinking.

learning_goals: Analyze changes in the operation, facilities, and instructional delivery of educational systems through IoT technology using a systems thinking framework.
Evaluate cases where logistics management and facility design in educational settings adaptively respond to learner needs via IoT.
Propose IoT-based educational innovation plans in project format, assuming mobile device usage in resource-constrained technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
